labReportDefault: laboratory exercise report must be submitted within a week of its completion
examSession: Exam dates for the subject are determined by the exam session schedule.
randomEvents: In case of random events preventing completion on dates indicated in the regulations, the teacher will set a new date at least one week in advance and inform students about it using the Leon platform.
seminar: Seminar: the schedule for verifying the achievement of learning outcomes is determined by the teacher.
